name: Unfriended: Dark Web
summary_text: A teen comes into possession of a new laptop and soon discovers that the previous owner is not only watching him, but will also do anything to get it back.

name: Manhattan
summary_text: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

name: I Hate Suzie
summary_text: A female celebrity has her whole life upended when her phone is hacked and a photo of her emerges in an extremely compromising position.

name: The Core
summary_text: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

name: The Wedding Date
summary_text: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
summary_text: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

name: Forever My Girl
summary_text: After being gone for a decade a country star returns home to the love he left behind.

name: Excision
summary_text: A disturbed and delusional high school student with aspirations of a career in medicine goes to extremes to earn the approval of her controlling mother.

name: The Phantom
summary_text: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

name: Mary Kills People
summary_text: Single mother Mary Harris is an ER doctor by day, but by night she and her partner, a former plastic surgeon, moonlight as underground angels of death who help terminally ill patients slip away on their own terms.

name: Carnal Knowledge
summary_text: Chronicling the lifelong sexual development of two men who meet and become friends in college.

name: Creed III
summary_text: Third installment of the 'Creed' franchise.

name: Mimic
summary_text: Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.

name: Secret Magic Control Agency
summary_text: The Secret Magic Control Agency sends its two best agents, Hansel and Gretel, to fight against the witch of the Gingerbread House.

name: Spaced
summary_text: Friends Tim and Daisy, 20-something North Londoners with uncertain futures, must pretend to be a couple to live in the only apartment they can afford.

name: Into the Storm
summary_text: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

name: Donovan's Reef
summary_text: Comedy subtly dealing with moral issues such as racial bigotry, corporate greed, American belief of societal superiority and hypocrisy.

name: Godmothered
summary_text: A young and unskilled fairy godmother ventures out on her own to prove her worth by tracking down a young girl whose request for help was ignored.

name: Blind Fury
summary_text: A blind Vietnam vet, trained as a swordfighter, comes to America and helps to rescue the son of a fellow soldier.

name: Brick
summary_text: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

name: Ophelia
summary_text: A re-imagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.

name: Funny Girl
summary_text: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

name: Highschool of the Dead
summary_text: High school students are overwhelmed with the start of the zombie apocalypse.

name: How NOT to Summon a Demon Lord
summary_text: An elite player is summoned by two maidens to save a fantasy game.

name: Winchester
summary_text: Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.

name: Living Single
summary_text: Follows the lives of several single male and female roommates and friends in 1990s Brooklyn, New York.

name: Austin & Ally
summary_text: Following the lives of confident aspiring musician Austin, quiet talented songwriter Ally, and their two friends.

name: Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot
summary_text: On the rocky path to sobriety after a life-changing accident, John Callahan discovers the healing power of art, willing his injured hands into drawing hilarious, often controversial cartoons, which bring him a new lease on life.

name: Naked Attraction
summary_text: A controversial dating series in which people see potential love interests whose naked bodies are gradually revealed to them. Then they must get naked themselves and choose.

name: Lady Vengeance
summary_text: After being wrongfully imprisoned for thirteen years and having her child taken away from her, a woman seeks revenge through increasingly brutal means.

name: My Days of Mercy
summary_text: The daughter of a man on death row falls in love with a woman on the opposing side of her family's political cause.

name: In Harm's Way
summary_text: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

name: Judgment at Nuremberg
summary_text: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

name: Untitled Elvis Presley Project
summary_text: A look at the life of the legendary rock and roll star, Elvis Presley.

name: The Hustler
summary_text: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

name: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
summary_text: Saiki Kusuo is a powerful psychic who hates attracting attention, yet he is surrounded by colorful characters who always find a way to remove him from his everyday life.

name: Wild 'N Out
summary_text: Watch as Nick Cannon and a new A-list celebrity lead a team of improv comedians each week as they compete against each other in the new show: Nick Cannon Presents Wild 'N Out.

name: Cold Skin
summary_text: A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.

name: My Sister's Keeper
summary_text: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

name: The Flintstones
summary_text: The misadventures of two modern-day Stone Age families, the Flintstones and the Rubbles.

name: Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth
summary_text: An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.

name: Secret Window
summary_text: A successful writer in the midst of a painful divorce is stalked at his remote lake house by a would-be scribe who accuses him of plagiarism.

name: Cypher
summary_text: Will Scott, one of the FBI's leading crypto-analysts is hired to crack a heavily coded document. He soon discovers it's a hit list, putting him in the cross-hairs of the bad guys who want it back.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
summary_text: Four college freshmen and best friends find that it may take more than a shared pair of jeans to help them stay in touch as their lives go in different directions.

name: Detective Conan
summary_text: The cases of a detective whose physical age was chemically reversed to that of a prepubescent boy but must hide his true mental development.

name: Kid 90
summary_text: An intimate look at young Hollywood starlets growing up in the 1990s, using hundreds of hours of footage captured by Soleil Moon Frye.

name: Spanglish
summary_text: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.

name: A Night at the Roxbury
summary_text: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

name: Orgazmo
summary_text: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

name: Rogue City
summary_text: Caught in the cross hairs of police corruption and Marseille's warring gangs, a loyal cop must protect his squad by taking matters into his own hands.

name: The Call
summary_text: In the fall of 1987, a group of small-town friends must survive the night in the home of a sinister couple after a tragic accident brings them to the couple's door.

name: This Boy's Life
summary_text: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 1950s teenager and his abusive stepfather, based on the memoirs of writer and literature Professor Tobias Wolff.

name: Benny Loves You
summary_text: Jack, a man desperate to improve his life throws away his beloved childhood plush, Benny. It's a move that has disastrous consequences when Benny springs to life with deadly intentions.

name: Hotel Del Luna
summary_text: When he's invited to manage a hotel for dead souls, an elite hotelier gets to know the establishment's ancient owner and her strange world.

name: The Cafe
summary_text: A café in Weston-super-Mare run by generational trio Mary (June Watson), Carol (Ellie Haddington) and Sarah (Michelle Terry).

name: Rare Beasts
summary_text: An anti rom-com about Mandy, a career-driven single mother, who falls in love with the charming, traditionalist Pete.

name: Reply 1988
summary_text: Follows the lives of 5 families living on the same street in a neighbourhood called Ssangmundong in Seoul. It takes a nostalgic look back at the year 1988.

name: From Beyond
summary_text: A group of scientists have developed the Resonator, a machine which allows whoever is within range to see beyond normal perceptible reality. But when the experiment succeeds, they are immediately attacked by terrible life forms.

name: Threads
summary_text: The effects of a nuclear holocaust on the working class city of Sheffield, England and the eventual long-term effects of nuclear war on civilization.

name: Joji
summary_text: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

name: The Thing About Harry
summary_text: Two high school enemies are forced to drive together to a friend's engagement party on Valentine's Day.

name: Three Identical Strangers
summary_text: In 1980 New York, three young men who were all adopted meet each other and find out they're triplets who were separated at birth. But their quest to find out why turns into a bizarre and sinister mystery.

name: Jersey Girl
summary_text: A widower must look after his precocious daughter and rebuild his life and career after he's sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup.

name: The Money Pit
summary_text: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

name: Kate
summary_text: A female assassin has 24 hours to get vengeance on her murderer before she dies.

name: The Royle Family
summary_text: A British sitcom about a family going through everyday life in the Royle family house.

name: eXistenZ
summary_text: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

name: Disturbing Behavior
summary_text: The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

name: Chicago Hope
summary_text: The lives and trials of the staff of a major hospital in Chicago.

name: Super Troopers 2
summary_text: When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.

name: Little
summary_text: A woman is transformed into her younger self at a point in her life when the pressures of adulthood become too much to bear.

name: The Way We Were
summary_text: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

name: Her Kind of Man
summary_text: A nightclub singer is caught between a big-time gangster and a tough Broadway columnist.

name: Mr. Iglesias
summary_text: A good-natured high school teacher working at his alma mater works with gifted but misfit and disinterested students.

name: The Misfits
summary_text: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

name: The Verdict
summary_text: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

name: Rise of the Guardians
summary_text: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

name: Bandolero!
summary_text: Mace Bishop (James Stewart) masquerades as a hangman in order to save his outlaw brother, Dee (Dean Martin), from the gallows, runs to Mexico chased by Sheriff July Johnson's (George Kennedy's) posse and fights against Mexican bandits.

name: One Cut of the Dead
summary_text: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low budget zombie movie in an abandoned WWII Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.

name: Being Human
summary_text: A werewolf, a vampire and a ghost try to live together and get along.

name: Brotherhood of the Wolf
summary_text: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

name: Every Which Way but Loose
summary_text: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

name: Stardust
summary_text: The rise and fall of the rock singer Jim Maclaine, in the mid 60s, with his manager, Mike, and his group, "The Stray Cats."

name: The Celebration
summary_text: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

name: Dispatches from Elsewhere
summary_text: Feeling as though there's something missing in their lives, four ordinary people stumble across a puzzle hiding just beyond the veil of everyday life, and their eyes are opened to a world of possibility and magic.

name: The Drovers Wife
summary_text: A lonely bushwoman struggles to raise her children and run the family farm while her husband is away.

name: Far Cry 3
summary_text: While skydiving, Jason Brody and his friends land on an island overrun by pirates, where Jason is torn between fighting for the Rakyat resistance and rescuing his friends.

name: Where the Wild Things Are
summary_text: Yearning for escape and adventure, a young boy runs away from home and sails to an island filled with creatures that take him in as their king.

name: The Mystery of a Hansom Cab
summary_text: A man is murdered in 19th century Melbourne. The investigation uncovers a trail of secrets and scandal.

name: Cyborg
summary_text: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

name: The Royals
summary_text: Drama about a fictional British royal family in modern-day London.

name: Doctors
summary_text: The daily lives of staff at a Birmingham medical practice, including their often dramatic involvements with their patients.

name: Jeepers Creepers III
summary_text: Sheriff Dan Tashtego and a team of creeper hunters enlist the help of officer Davis Tubbs to help stop the monster's eating spree.

name: Popular
summary_text: Two girls who despise each other, due to being on opposite sides of the "popularity fence", are forced together upon learning that their parents are getting married.

name: Queer as Folk
summary_text: A groundbreaking gay adult drama which chronicles the lives of Stuart and Vince, as well as 15-year-old Nathan, who is in love with Stuart.

name: Saved by the Bell: The New Class
summary_text: A new group of students are now making their way through the halls of Bayside High School. Mr. Belding is still the principal, and Screech is now his assistant.

name: Traffik
summary_text: A couple off for a romantic weekend in the mountains are accosted by a biker gang. Alone in the mountains, Brea and John must defend themselves against the gang, who will stop at nothing to protect their secrets.

name: Bitten
summary_text: Elena navigates her life between the human world and the werewolf world as the only female of the species.

name: The Master of Disguise
summary_text: An Italian waiter fights off a criminal mastermind with his inherited powers of disguise.

name: Withnail & I
summary_text: In 1969, two substance-abusing, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

name: The Wizard
summary_text: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

name: Butterfly
summary_text: In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.

name: The Dissident
summary_text: When Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi disappears in Istanbul, his fiancée and dissidents around the world piece together the clues to a murder and expose a global cover up.

name: Never Back Down: No Surrender
summary_text: Picking up after the events of Never Back Down 2, former MMA champion Case Walker is on the comeback trail to become champion once again.

name: The Stepford Wives
summary_text: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.

name: Harold and Maude
summary_text: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

name: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
summary_text: Janey is new in town and soon meets Lynne, who shares her passion for dancing in general and "Dance TV" in particular.

name: Jack
summary_text: Because of an unusual disorder that has aged him four times faster than a typical human being, a boy looks like a 40-year-old man as he starts fifth grade at public school after being homeschooled.

name: Vigil
summary_text: The mysterious disappearance of a Scottish fishing trawler and a death on-board a Trident nuclear submarine bring the police into conflict with the Navy and British security services.

name: American Vandal
summary_text: A true-crime satire that explores the aftermath of a costly high school prank that left twenty-seven faculty cars vandalized with phallic images.

name: Dinner for Schmucks
summary_text: When he finds out that his work superiors host a dinner celebrating the idiocy of their guests, a rising executive questions it when he's invited, just as he befriends a man who would be the perfect guest.

name: The Ambassador's Daughter
summary_text: Sancar has always & Nare has always yearned for love. When they meet and fall in love as children, they know they are meant to be; they just have to wait to be old enough to marry. On the ...                See full summary »

name: Rio 2
summary_text: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets his father-in-law.

name: Wire in the Blood
summary_text: A psychologist gets inside of the minds of both killers and victims to aid the police in solving gruesome serial killings in Northern England.

name: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
summary_text: The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.

name: MasterChef Australia
summary_text: A few dozen home chefs battle it out in the Masterchef Kitchen to earn the best chef title, judged by top Australian chefs.

name: No Offence
summary_text: Follows a group of police officers on the front line wondering what they did to end up where they are now, on the ugly side of Manchester.

name: Last Moment of Clarity
summary_text: Three years after witnessing the murder of his fiancée, a man finds himself a fearful drifter, until one day at a Parisian cinema he sees an actress who looks a lot like his dead love, and eventually he finds the truth about his fiancée.

name: Evan Almighty
summary_text: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

name: Unsane
summary_text: A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear - but is it real or a product of her delusion?

name: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
summary_text: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

name: Big Eyes
summary_text: A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

name: No Escape Room
summary_text: When an escape room attraction turns from a fun bonding activity to a dangerous paranormal experience, a father and daughter must flee from an angry spirit.

name: 1971: The Year That Music Changed Everything
summary_text: The musicians and soundtracks that shaped the culture and politics of 1971.

name: Silk Stalkings
summary_text: "Cassy" St. John and Tom Ryan are the new duo in town. It is now their job to catch the killers of Palm Beach.

name: Poms
summary_text: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheer leading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'

name: Dangerous Minds
summary_text: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

name: Hatfields & McCoys
summary_text: Dramatization of the bitter blood feud between the two families on the West Virginia/Kentucky border in the years after the Civil War.

name: Paradise Hills
summary_text: Uma is a young woman who wakes up in an apparently idyllic reform school for young ladies. But a dark secret lies within its walls.

name: The Titan
summary_text: A military family takes part in a ground-breaking experiment of genetic evolution and space exploration.

name: Mulholland Falls
summary_text: In 1950's Los Angeles, a special crime squad of the LAPD investigates the murder of a young woman.

name: Eight Men Out
summary_text: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

name: The Producers
summary_text: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

name: The Perfect Wedding Match
summary_text: Programmer for a matchmaking app Maisie Jacobs is single and dateless for her sister Ali's wedding. Maisie uses the app, but is sent the only person she would never date. Could the mix-up be her chance for true love?

name: Sentinelle
summary_text: Transferred home after a traumatizing combat mission, a trained French soldier uses her lethal skills to hunt down the man who hurt her sister.

name: Death on the Nile
summary_text: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

name: Wolf
summary_text: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

name: Text for You
summary_text: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

name: The Long, Hot Summer
summary_text: Accused barn burner and conman Ben Quick (Paul Newman) arrives in a small Mississippi town and quickly ingratiates himself with its richest family, the Varners.

name: The Command
summary_text: The film follows the 2000 K-141 Kursk submarine disaster and the governmental negligence that followed. As the sailors fight for survival, their families desperately battle political obstacles and impossible odds to save them.

name: The Getaway
summary_text: A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

name: The Son
summary_text: A multi-generational epic telling of the story of America's birth as a superpower through the bloody rise and fall of one Texas oil empire.

name: Goosebumps
summary_text: A series of scary anthology stories based on the children's books by R.L. Stine. Series one was hosted by R.L. Stine.

name: The Promise
summary_text: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, The Promise follows a love triangle between Michael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated Ana, and Chris - a renowned American journalist based in Paris.

name: The Man in the Moon
summary_text: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

name: Playing It Cool
summary_text: Unrequited love motivates a guy to write about his experiences.

name: Hell's Angels
summary_text: Brothers Monte and Ray leave Oxford to join the Royal Flying Corps. Ray loves Helen; Helen enjoys an affair with Monte; before they leave on their mission over Germany they find her in still another man's arms.

name: Ethos
summary_text: A group of unique characters from dramatically different socio-cultural backgrounds meeting in startling circumstances in the vibrant and colorful city of Istanbul, - some by chance and some by force of will.

name: Atlantis
summary_text: Far from home, Jason washes up on the shores of the ancient and mysterious city of Atlantis.

name: The Burnt Orange Heresy
summary_text: Hired to steal a rare painting from one of the most enigmatic painters of all time, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

name: Paper Moon
summary_text: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

name: Heartbreak High
summary_text: The series based on the lives of a group of students who attend the fictional Hartley High School in Sydney. Praised for its willingness to tackle gritty issues, from drugs to romance to ...                See full summary »

name: Sand Castle
summary_text: The story follows a young soldier, and his introduction into the 2003 invasion of Iraq. Based on true events, it bears witness to the destruction, and horrors of war.

name: Dial M for Murder
summary_text: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

name: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
summary_text: Anthony Bourdain visits countries, delving into their political issues as well as indigenous food and culture.

name: Soldier
summary_text: A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

name: The Inbetweeners
summary_text: Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.

name: Love 101
summary_text: In 1990s Turkey, a group of teenage outcasts band together to make their beloved teacher fall in love so she'll have a reason to stay in town with them.

name: Spookies
summary_text: A wicked sorcerer tries to sacrifice a group of people inside his house with the intention of using their vitality to keep his wife alive.

name: The Real Manhunter
summary_text: Former Detective Chief Inspector Colin Sutton spent 30 years in the police force, a career that saw him lead many of the most high profile and successful murder investigations of his ...                See full summary »

name: A Christmas Story
summary_text: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

name: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy
summary_text: Stanley Tucci travels across Italy to discover the secrets and delights of the country's regional cuisines.

name: Primal
summary_text: Frank's caught wildlife in the Brazilian jungle incl. a 400 lbs. white jaguar. He ships it on the same ship as an arrested assassin. The assassin breaks free and frees the animals.

name: The Shadow
summary_text: In 1930s New York City, The Shadow (Alec Baldwin) battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan (John Lone), who is building an atomic bomb.

name: In the Cut
summary_text: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

name: Dream/Killer
summary_text: In 2005, 20-year-old Ryan Ferguson was convicted and sentenced to 40 years in prison for a crime he did not commit, causing his father, Bill, to embark on a 10-year campaign to prove Ryan's innocence.

name: Good Bye Lenin!
summary_text: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

name: Documentary Now!
summary_text: Documentary Now parodies the current obsession with documentaries. Season one features six different stories and stylistic approaches paying tribute to the doc format.

name: Eye in the Sky
summary_text: Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern warfare.

name: About Last Night
summary_text: A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.

name: High School Musical 2
summary_text: School's out for summer and the East High Wildcats are ready to make it the time of their lives after landing jobs in a wealthy country club owned by Sharpay and Ryan's family.

name: Carriers
summary_text: As a lethal virus spreads globally, four friends seek a reputed plague-free haven. But while avoiding the infected, the travelers turn on one another.

name: Hard Eight
summary_text: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

name: The Year of Living Dangerously
summary_text: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

When terrorists try to seize control of a Berlin-Paris flight, a soft-spoken American co-pilot struggles to save the lives of the passengers and crew while forging a surprising connection with one of the hijackers.

name: Helluva Boss
summary_text: Follow Blitz, a classic demon Imp who sets out to run his own small assassin business with his weapons specialist Moxxie, his bruiser Millie, and his receptionist hellhound Loona. Together ...                See full summary »

name: Whisper of the Heart
summary_text: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

name: Heartbreakers
summary_text: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

name: Overboard
summary_text: After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.

name: Capote
summary_text: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

name: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
summary_text: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

name: Doogie Howser, M.D.
summary_text: A teenage genius deals with the usual problems of growing up, on top of being a licensed physician in a difficult residency program.

name: Generation War
summary_text: Five friends go out to war and promise each other to be back for Christmas.

name: Rocky II
summary_text: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

name: Fanboys
summary_text: Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) before its release.

name: Super Deluxe
summary_text: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

name: Django/Zorro
summary_text: Several years after the events of Django Unchained (2012), Django meets Don Diego de la Vega, the famed Zorro, and agrees to become his bodyguard on a mission to free the local aboriginal population from slavery.

name: The Bob Newhart Show
summary_text: The professional and personal misadventures of a psychologist and his family, patients, friends and colleagues.

name: The Howling
summary_text: After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

name: North & South
summary_text: North and South is a four part adaptation of Elizabeth Gaskell's love story of Margaret Hale, a middle class southerner who is forced to move to the northern town of Milton.

name: Seberg
summary_text: Inspired by real events in the life of French New Wave icon Jean Seberg. In the late 1960s, Hoover's FBI targeted her because of her political and romantic involvement with civil rights activist Hakim Jamal.

name: Red Dot
summary_text: When Nadja becomes pregnant, they make an attempt to rekindle their relationship by traveling to the north of Sweden for a hiking trip but soon their romantic trip turns into a nightmare.

name: Bad Samaritan
summary_text: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

name: The 10th Kingdom
summary_text: A father and daughter are caught in a parallel universe where the great Queens Snow White, Cinderella and Riding Hood III have had their kingdoms fragmented by warring trolls, giants and goblins.

name: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
summary_text: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

name: Hair
summary_text: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

name: 3-D Sex and Zen: Extreme Ecstasy
summary_text: As a conceited scholar of the Ming Dynasty, Wei Yangsheng believes that since life is short, one should pursue the ultimate sexual pleasure as time allows.

name: Mansfield Park
summary_text: Fanny, born into a poor family, is sent away to live with wealthy uncle Sir Thomas, his wife and their four children, where she'll be brought up for a proper introduction to society.

name: Following
summary_text: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

name: Dear White People
summary_text: At a predominantly white Ivy League college, a group of black students navigate various forms of racial and other types of discrimination.

name: London
summary_text: London is a drug laden adventure that centers on a party in a New York loft where a young man is trying to win back his ex-girlfriend.

name: Rent-a-Girlfriend
summary_text: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a college student enlists a dating service to "rent" a girlfriend who, unbeknownst to him, happens to be both a fellow student and his neighbor.

name: At Close Range
summary_text: Reunited with his career criminal father, tough teen Brad thinks he's found his ticket to an exciting life of crime, only to find out he's wrong.

name: Executive Decision
summary_text: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

name: Red, White and Water
summary_text: A US soldier suffers a traumatic brain injury while fighting in Afghanistan and struggles to adjust to life back home.

name: The Way
summary_text: A father heads overseas to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling the "El camino de Santiago," and decides to take the pilgrimage himself.

name: Flatliners
summary_text: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.

name: Kolchak: The Night Stalker
summary_text: Carl Kolchak is a reporter for a Chicago newspaper. Through more accident than design he ends up investigating homicides, many of which involve supernatural forces. Ultimately, rather than reporting on the crimes, he solves them.

name: Dagon
summary_text: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

name: Happy Together
summary_text: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

name: Woke
summary_text: Keef is an African-American cartoonist on the verge of mainstream success when an unexpected incident changes his life.

name: Our Kind of Traitor
summary_text: A couple finds themselves lured into a Russian oligarch's plans to defect, and are soon positioned between the Russian Mafia and the British Secret Service, neither of whom they can trust.

name: The Plot Against America
summary_text: Characters live in an alternative history in which Franklin D. Roosevelt was defeated in the U.S. presidential election of 1940 by Charles Lindbergh.

name: Breathe
summary_text: The inspiring true love story of Robin (Andrew Garfield) and Diana Cavendish (Claire Foy), an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. Their heartwarming celebration of human possibility marks the directorial debut of Andy Serkis.

name: Third Watch
summary_text: The exploits of a group of men and women who serve New York City as police officers, firemen, and paramedics in the fictional 55th Precinct.

name: Beautiful Girls
summary_text: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

name: Ben 10: Alien Force
summary_text: Fifteen-year-old Ben Tennyson must utilize the Omnitrix yet again in order to locate his missing Grandpa Max, accompanied by his cousin Gwen and former enemy Kevin 11.

name: Rent: Live
summary_text: The story of several friends in New York City facing financial poverty, homophobia, AIDS, and, of course, rent.

name: Belle de Jour
summary_text: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

name: Any Given Sunday
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

name: The Lifeguard
summary_text: A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.

name: Titan A.E.
summary_text: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

name: JL50
summary_text: A plane is discovered to have recently crashed in West Bengal. However, what is so baffling about the incident is that plane originally went missing 35 years ago.

name: Idle Hands
summary_text: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

name: Jackie
summary_text: Following the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, First Lady Jacqueline Kennedy fights through grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define her husband's historic legacy.

name: The Relic
summary_text: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

name: Next
summary_text: A former tech CEO joins an FBI Cybersecurity Agent to stop the emergence of a rogue Artificial Intelligence.

name: Bachelorette
summary_text: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

name: Cranford
summary_text: In the 1840s, Cranford is ruled by the ladies. They adore good gossip, and romance and change is in the air, as the unwelcome grasp of the Industrial Revolution rapidly approaches their beloved rural market-town.

name: Dolemite Is My Name
summary_text: Eddie Murphy portrays real-life legend Rudy Ray Moore, a comedy and rap pioneer who proved naysayers wrong when his hilarious, obscene, kung-fu fighting alter ego, Dolemite, became a 1970s Blaxploitation phenomenon.

name: The Romanoffs
summary_text: Anthology of eight stories about people who believe themselves to be descendant of the Russian Royal family.

name: The Prophecy
summary_text: At the scene of a bizarre murder, L.A. homicide detective Thomas Dagget discovers a lethal heavenly prophecy now being fulfilled on earth. In his fight to stop the forces of evil, he finds an unlikely ally in an elementary school teacher.

name: Night Gallery
summary_text: Rod Serling presents tales of horror illustrated in various paintings.

name: Emily and the Magical Journey
summary_text: Emily and her mother live alone after losing her father. She wants to help her mother find happiness and to learn about the father she never knew. When Emily finds a mysterious chest that ...                See full summary »

name: Love, Romance, & Chocolate
summary_text: Emma and chocolatier Luc compete for Belgium's Royal Chocolatier. The beauty and romance of Bruges inspire unique chocolate combinations, but will their entry win without them losing their hearts?

name: Dead Like Me
summary_text: After being hit on the head by a toilet seat, a young temp clerk becomes a grim reaper in death.

name: Grizzly II: Revenge
summary_text: All hell breaks loose when a giant Grizzly, reacting to the slaughter of Grizzlies by poachers, attacks at a massive big-band rock concert in the National Park.

name: Witches of East End
summary_text: Two sister, bartender and librarian, discover as adults that they're witches with magical powers. They, their mom and her sister, all witches, are up against a mortal enemy.

name: Looking Glass
summary_text: A couple buy a desert motel where they find that strange, mysterious events occur.

name: The Paramedic
summary_text: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.

name: The Vanishing
summary_text: Three lighthouse keepers on the remote Flannan Isles find a hidden trunk of gold, leading to their mysterious disappearance.

name: The Final Destination
summary_text: A horrifying premonition saves a young man and his friends from death during a racetrack accident but terrible fates await them nonetheless.

name: Ayla: The Daughter of War
summary_text: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

name: Volcano
summary_text: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.

name: The Invisible Guardian
summary_text: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

name: A Million Little Pieces
summary_text: A drug dependent young man faces his past and his inner demons after he is interned in an institution for addicted.

name: Race to Witch Mountain
summary_text: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

name: The Queen
summary_text: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

name: How Green Was My Valley
summary_text: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

name: Reality Bites
summary_text: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Generation X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.
